main event: A witness reported seeing a sizeable round light in the southern sky which moved toward the northwest and disappeared on July 15, 1957.
interesting points: The witness observed the object for approximately 6 minutes., The object was described as low and round, and possibly a balloon or aircraft., The sighting occurred at night with unclear sky conditions., The witness was engaged in repairing a brake line on a tractor when they first noticed the object., There were indications of a possible astronomical event related to the sighting.
witness description: A male strategy analyst in the USAF
